sendFile(File) - Method in class model.SocketManager
Send a file via the Sockets by reading it and making a FileMessage and writing to the socket
sendMessage(Message) - Method in class model.SocketManager
Send a Message Object by the OutputStream if an error occurs we close the connection.
sendMsg(Message) - Method in class model.ClientThread
Methode qui appelle sendMessage du client
sendUserInfo(User) - Method in class model.SocketManager

Server - Class in model
Server manage all that have to do with the server side aspect of the connection between sockets it extends SocketManage that does most of the heavy lifting
Server() - Constructor for class model.Server
Constructor that build the server by getting the port from the context singleton
Server(int) - Constructor for class model.Server
Construct the server by using the port provided as an argument.
ServerThread - Class in model
Server thread make a thread to run the server without blocking the app main thread

SocketManager - Class in model
this abstract class deal with the shared functionnality of the Server and the Client

start(Stage) - Method in class controller.AppController
Javafx Start method
start() - Method in class model.Client
Methode start du thread ouvre le socket avec un serveur avec l'ip et le port qui lui est donner par l'attribut user ouvre l'outputStream et l'inputStream envoie les info User de l'usager de l'application au serveur connecter commence l'ecoute des streams avise qui ecoute la classe un message pour signaler la connection si la connection echoue un message d'erreur et afficher et la deconnection et lancer pour fermer les streams ou le serveur si possible.
start() - Method in class model.Server
Overrided start method of SocketManager it start the serverSocket from the port and wait for a socket to connect to it and then open the streams send the user information and advice the listeners that it is now connected and has a socket connected to it
start() - Method in class model.SocketManager
Method that need to be written for the Client or the Server
startListening() - Method in class model.SocketManager
